messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] volunteer-
messages.msgSnippet: Diane, I was a lone leader for a long time, what seemed like years but was actually months.  Maybe you can voluteer to help her with some of her
messages.messageBody:
Diane,
I was a lone leader for a long time, what seemed like years but was actually
months. Maybe you can voluteer to help her with some of her
responsiblilites, if she has any she can delegate to you. I NEVER turn down
an offer for help and I doubt your leader will either.

Happy Mothering,
Julie
Mommy to Ali and Matthew, Wife to a Great Man, Adam
Please check out a few of my favorite sites:
http://www.mothering.com
http://www.AttachmentParenting.org
http://www.LaLecheLeague.org
http://www.naturalchild.org
"It helps me to remember that people are more important than ideas and that
being kind is more important than being right."
-Peggy O'Mara, Publisher of Mothering Magazine.
